sentences.sContent: The course is open to anyone, irrespective of age.
sentences.sCn: 这门课任何人都可参加，没有年龄限制。

sentences.sContent: ...their commitment to a society based on equality for all citizens irrespective of ethnic origin.
sentences.sCn: …他们为建设一个没有种族差别、全民平等的社会所做出的贡献。

synos.tran: 无关的；不考虑的；不顾的

phrases.pCn: 不论损失如何全部赔偿

remMethod.val: ir(不) ＋ respect(注意， 考虑) ＋ ive → 不考虑的， 不顾及的

trans.tranOther: used when saying that a particular fact has no effect on a situation and is not important
